Jokowi Kumpul Bareng Puluhan Bankir di Senayan
06 Nov 2019, 03:40 by Danang Sugianto


Jokowi/Foto: dok. Biro Pers Setpres

Jakarta - Para bankir yang tergabung dalam Perhimpunan Bank-bank Nasional (Perbanas) pagi ini menggelar acara pertemuan tahunan Indonesia Banking Expo 2019 bertema Consolidate to Elevate. Acara ini pun akan dihadiri oleh Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi).Sebelum dibuka Jokowi, acara dimulai dengan pidato oleh Wakil Menteri Keuangan Suahasil Nazara. Dalam pidatonya dia meminta perbankan agar terus mendorong perannya dalam perekonomian Indonesia."Dalam konteks seperti ini maka inilah konteks pengelolaan APBN yang kita harapkan support-nya terus. Karena perbankan adalah komponen terbesar sektor keuangan Indonesia yang porsinya mencapai 80%," ujarnya di Hotel Fairmont, Senayan, Jakarta Selatan, Rabu (6/11/2019).Sebagai pemerintah, dia menitipkan tiga perbaikan di sektor keuangan yang diharapkan bisa dilakukan perbankan. Pertama pendalaman pasar keuangan."Perlu dilakukan financial deepening. Ini adalah PR kita bersama," tambahnya.Kedua perluasan inklusi keuangan. Menurutnya jika perbankan turut mendorong inklusi keuangan dampaknya pun akan kembali ke industri perbankan."Financial inclusion adalah bisnis yang menjanjikan di masa mendatang. Apa lagi masyarakat kita 250 juta lebih dan pendapatannya naik terus," tegasnya.Terakhir adalah ketahanan dunia keuangan. Di sektor ini pemerintah turun tangan dengan membentuk Komite Stabilitas Sistem Keuangan (KSSK) yang terdiri dari Kementerian Keuangan, Bank Indonesia (BI), OJK, dan LPS.Jokowi sendiri hadir di lokasi pada pukul 10.25 WIB. Pengamanan pun sudah terliha menyambut orang nomor 1 di Indonesia itu. Simak Video "Sidang Gugatan MAKI ke KPK soal Bank Century Ditunda"[Gambas:Video 20detik](das/ara)

Jokowi Gathered Together with Tens of Bankers in Senayan
Nov 6 2019, 03:40 by Danang Sugianto


Jokowi / Photo: doc. Press Secret Press Bureau

Jakarta - Bankers who are members of the National Banks Association (Perbanas) this morning held an annual meeting of the Indonesia Banking Expo 2019 with the theme Consolidate to Elevate. The event will also be attended by President Joko Widodo (Jokowi). Before Jokowi opens, the event will begin with a speech by Deputy Minister of Finance Suahasil Nazara. In his speech he asked banks to continue to encourage their role in the Indonesian economy. "In this context, this is the context of managing the state budget, which we hope will continue to support. Because banking is the largest component of Indonesia's financial sector, the portion reaches 80%," he said at the Fairmont Hotel , Senayan, South Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). As a government, he left three improvements in the financial sector that are expected to be carried out by banks. First is the deepening of the financial market. "It is necessary to do financial deepening. This is our common homework," he added. Second, the expansion of financial inclusion. According to him, if the banking industry encourages financial inclusion, the impact will return to the banking industry. "Financial inclusion is a promising business in the future. What's more, our society is 250 million more and its income continues to rise," he said. In this sector the government intervened by forming a Financial System Stability Committee (KSSK) consisting of the Ministry of Finance, Bank Indonesia (BI), OJK, and LPS. Jokowi himself was present at the location at 10:25 WIB. Security is already seen welcoming the number 1 person in Indonesia.
